definition: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc
lit. a piece of rat feces spoiled the whole pot of soup (idiom)/fig. one bad apple can spoil the whole bunch
pinyin: yi1 ke1 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 tang1
containing_words.word: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋湯

definition: see 一粒老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥|一粒老鼠屎坏了一锅粥[yi1 li4 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 zhou1]
pinyin: yi1 ke1 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 zhou1
containing_words.word: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
not a single grain was reaped (as in a bad harvest year)

sentences.english: Under government policy, British nuclear submarines carry a maximum of 48 warheads.
sentences.chinese: 據政府政策規定，英國核潛艇最多可裝載48顆彈頭。

sentences.english: He whiffed 10 Mets in a game last June 17 at Yankee Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 去年他在洋基球場上三振掉了10顆梅子。

sentences.english: In sending twenty, they had been perhaps a little over-zealous.
sentences.chinese: 而他們往倫敦投送了20顆，表現得真是過於積極了。

sentences.english: Observers under dark skies could see up to 20 meteors per hour.
sentences.chinese: 暗夜裏的觀測者每小時最多可見到20顆流星。

sentences.english: By age 3, your child should have a full set of 20 baby teeth.
sentences.chinese: 到三歲時，你的寶寶就能長全20顆乳牙了。

sentences.english: But a weed plant can produce tens or even hundreds of thousands of seeds.
sentences.chinese: 但每株雜草能產生數萬甚至數十萬顆種子。

sentences.english: China to launch fifth orbiter for its own 'GPS' .
sentences.chinese: 我國近日將擇機發射第五顆北斗導航衛星。

sentences.english: 6000 have been collected in Ukraine so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，他們在烏克蘭收集了6000顆牙齒。

sentences.english: Witchweed seed cancels capsules can hold four hundred to five hundred seeds.
sentences.chinese: 獨腳金種子膠囊可以保存四到五百顆種子。

sentences.english: The droplets shot into the air at the rate of four million per second.
sentences.chinese: 液滴向空中飛灑的速度是每秒四百萬顆。

sentences.english: Five large gemstones were found in South Africa and they weigh up to 507 carats.
sentences.chinese: 南非發現了5顆超大鑽石，總重達507克拉。

sentences.english: There's still time, the sun just single phosphor.
sentences.chinese: 來日方長，太陽只是顆啓明星。

sentences.english: How many teeth have you had filled in the past two years ?
sentences.chinese: 在過去的兩年裏你補過多少顆牙齒？

sentences.english: Carter saw at least three of the torpedoes explode into Yamato's hull from amidships to the bow.
sentences.chinese: 卡特至少看到3顆魚雷從船中部命中了大和號的船體。

sentences.english: The first day the boy hammered 37 nails into the fence.
sentences.chinese: 第一天，男孩將37顆釘子釘進了籬笆。

definition: lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units
one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
